Name: Kilimanjaro
Description: Mount Kilimanjaro is the highest mountain in Africa, located in Tanzania.

Name: Matterhorn
Description: Matterhorn is a mountain of the Alps, straddling the border between Switzerland and Italy.

Name: Aconcagua
Description: Aconcagua is the highest peak in both the Western Hemisphere and the Southern Hemisphere, located in Argentina.

Name: Fuji
Description: Mount Fuji is an active stratovolcano and the highest mountain in Japan.

Name: Elbrus
Description: Mount Elbrus is the highest mountain in Europe, located in the Caucasus Mountains of Russia.
